name: Farmed and Dangerous
description:
Your farm is under attack from the devious Evil Carrot (with gun) and the giant GargANTua. Harvest your wheat and exchange it for weapons at the shop, avoid the enemies and kill the bosses to win!

CONTROLS:    

Left Click - Use main weapon (Damages enemies)    

Right Click - Use scythe (chops down wheat and also knocks away enemies)    

WASD - Movement (Up/Left/Down/Right)   

 

We hope you enjoy it!
